item.title: Quitting Twitter - My side
item.description: I've decided to quit Twitter and just limit internet usage overall. Realized a while ago that it's been affecting my social status and overall health. I feel that this will improve myself as a person overall. This will also give me a chance to work on my schoolwork that I'm severly behind on. I feel I've rambled on enough about this, not anything too interesting. I'm sure you've heard this from others many times.

item.title: Why I think Reddit isn't a bad platform overall
item.description: I'm sure we've seen all the memes surrounding the popular social platform Reddit. Most of them mocking the platform or moderators of said platform, but honestly the platform isn't awful. If you find what communities you're into, (for me: r/ps2, r/wiiu, r/psp) then you have all the content you care for right there. No giant cesspools of garbage (usually).

item.title: RSS blog debut
item.description: Hello, my RSS blog will mostly consist of random thoughts and changes in my life. I doubt I'll even do weekly posts, but we'll see. Who knows what'll be on here?
